name: Saint Simon's Saw
description:
Saint Simon’s Saw is a tarot-like card deck that can assist with decision making and the interpretation of life events.  

The game was inspired by the life of Claude Henri de Rouvroy, Comte de Saint-Simon, a business visionary, educator, and social reformer who experienced both extreme success and colossal failure over the course of a fascinating life, working to envisage radical futures through the American and French revolutions of the 18th Century.

This game is currently available for Android devices, your feedback is welcome.
